bug: Backup gets stuck at 99% and never completes
Email notifications arrive 15-20 minutes late despite sync being enabled
Add to Cart button does not respond
notes:
[TECNO CK8n] I was able to successfully add an item to the cart. The 'Add to Cart' button functioned as expected, and the cart updated to reflect the added item. I did not observe any crashes, freezes, UI glitches, or errors.

[CPH2661] I opened the Amazon Shopping app, searched for a product ('laptop'), found a product with an 'Add to Cart' button, and clicked it. The button responded as expected. The item was added to the cart, and the UI updated to reflect this change by showing a quantity selector for the item and updating the cart icon to show one item. There were no crashes, freezes, UI glitches, or errors observed during this process. The app behaved normally.

verification_summary.result:
[TECNO CK8n] I was able to successfully add an item to the cart. The 'Add to Cart' button functioned as expected, and the cart updated to reflect the added item. I did not observe any crashes, freezes, UI glitches, or errors.

[CPH2661] I opened the Amazon Shopping app, searched for a product ('laptop'), found a product with an 'Add to Cart' button, and clicked it. The button responded as expected. The item was added to the cart, and the UI updated to reflect this change by showing a quantity selector for the item and updating the cart icon to show one item. There were no crashes, freezes, UI glitches, or errors observed during this process. The app behaved normally.
verification_summary.summary: Bug not reproduced on 0/2 devices (TECNO CK8n, CPH2661). Executed 34 verification steps. Confidence: HIGH.
